attributes.action: introduce legislation that prevents banks from imposing bank charges - keep banking free.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With banks continually announcing astronomical annual profits it is not right that the customers of any bank in the United Kingdom should be charged a fee for the privilege of gaining access to their own money or incur a fee merely for being frugal or thrifty.  In this day and age there is no option but to have a bank account for the purposes of automated salary or pension income transactions.  The people hit hardest will be those at the lowest end of the income scale who can least afford to pay such unfair, unwarranted or greedy fees.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
